original_text: For this is what the Lord, the God of Israel, says about the houses in this city and the royal palaces of Judah that have been torn down to be used against the siege ramps and the sword
korean_text: 이스라엘의 하나님 여호와께서 말씀하시니라 무리가 이 성읍의 가옥과 유다 왕궁을 헐어서 갈대아인의 참호와 칼을 대항하여

sentences.original_text: For this is what the Lord, the God of Israel, says
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 이스라엘의 하나님이신 주께서 말씀하시는 바입니다

sentences.original_text: about the houses in this city
and the royal palaces of Judah
to be used against the siege ramps
